name: ProgressBar
description: The ProgressBar module provides a unified interface for displaying progress bars during various actions. It supports different progress bar systems and styles.

clientFunctions.name: Open
clientFunctions.description: Opens a progress bar with specified options. Supports both bar and circle styles.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Function to call when progress bar completes or is cancelled

parameters.name: isQBFormat
parameters.description: Whether the options are in QB-Core format (will be auto-converted)

returns.description: Returns true if progress bar completed successfully, false if cancelled

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Basic progress bar
local success = Bridge.ProgressBar.Open({
    duration = 5000,
    label = "Repairing vehicle...",
    canCancel = true,
    disable = {
        move = true,
        car = true,
        combat = true
    },
    anim = {
        dict = "mini@repair",
        clip = "fixing_a_ped"
    }
})

if success then
    print("Repair completed!")
else
    print("Repair cancelled!")
end
